Package client

Class ECertisClient

java.lang.Object
client.ECertisClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
interfaces.ECertisClientInterface
public class ECertisClient extends Object implements interfaces.ECertisClientInterface
Contains methods that represent eCertis API calls. They all return a json String that contains information about Criteria and/or Evidences.

  • Method Details

    • criteriaCall

      public String criteriaCall(String uri, String nationalEntity, String type, @Nullable LocalDate updateDate, @Nullable String lang)
      It returns a list of all EU criteria that are not parent criteria. Parameters can filter the list. acceptance environment does not allow simultaneous empty 'nationalEntity' and 'type' values.
      Specified by:
      criteriaCall in interface interfaces.ECertisClientInterface
      Parameters:
      uri - The URI of the request. E.g: https://webgate.acceptance.ec.europa.eu/tools3/ecertis2/criteria
      nationalEntity - to retrieve national criteria specifying the ID of the country.
      type - to specify criterion type
      updateDate - to specify the oldest point in time in which a criterion has been updated.
      lang - to specify the language. Default is English.
      Returns:
      json String

    • criteriaCall

      public String criteriaCall(String uri, String scenarioId, String domainId)
      It returns a list of all EU criteria that are not parent criteria. Parameters can filter the list.
      Specified by:
      criteriaCall in interface interfaces.ECertisClientInterface
      Parameters:
      uri - The URI of the request. E.g: https://ec.europa.eu/growth/tools-databases/ecertisrest/criteria
      scenarioId - to specify a scenario.
      domainId - to specify a domain.
      Returns:
      json String

    • criterionCall

      public String criterionCall(String uri, String id, String version, @Nullable String lang, String countryFilter)
      Returns a specific version of a criterion, with all sub criterion linked to it and for each one returns all evidences that fulfill the criterion and all laws for all countries.
      Specified by:
      criterionCall in interface interfaces.ECertisClientInterface
      Parameters:
      uri - The URI of the request. E.g: https://ec.europa.eu/growth/tools-databases/ecertisrest/criteria/
      id - specify the id of a criterion
      version - to specify version. Defaults to first version.
      lang - to specify the language. Default is English.
      countryFilter - to specify national criteria.
      Returns:
      json String

    • criterionMdCall

      public String criterionMdCall(String uri, String id, String version, @Nullable String lang, String nationalEntity)
      Returns a specific version of a criterion, with all the evidences and all laws for all countries.
      Specified by:
      criterionMdCall in interface interfaces.ECertisClientInterface
      Parameters:
      uri - The URI of the request. E.g: https://webgate.acceptance.ec.europa.eu/tools3/ecertis2/criteriaMd/
      id - specify the id of a criterion
      version - to specify version. Defaults to first version.
      lang - to specify the language. Default is English.
      nationalEntity - to specify national criteria.
      Returns:
      json String

    • criterionESPDCall

      public String criterionESPDCall(String uri, String id, String version, @Nullable String lang, @Nullable String countryFilter)
      Returns a specific version of a criterion, with all sub criterion linked to it and for each one returns all evidences that fulfill the criterion and all laws for all countries.
      Specified by:
      criterionESPDCall in interface interfaces.ECertisClientInterface
      Parameters:
      uri - The URI of the request. E.g: https://webgate.acceptance.ec.europa.eu/tools3/ecertis2/criteria/espd/
      id - specify the id of a criterion
      version - to specify version. Defaults to first version.
      lang - to specify the language. Default is English.
      countryFilter - to specify national criteria.
      Returns:
      json String

    • evidencesCall

      public String evidencesCall(String uri, String nationalEntity, @Nullable LocalDate updateDate, @Nullable String lang)
      Without any parameters, it returns a list of all evidences. Parameters can filter the list.
      Specified by:
      evidencesCall in interface interfaces.ECertisClientInterface
      Parameters:
      uri - The URI of the request. E.g: https://webgate.acceptance.ec.europa.eu/tools3/ecertis2/evidences
      nationalEntity - to retrieve national criteria specifying the ID of the country.
      updateDate - to specify the oldest point in time in which a criterion has been updated.
      lang - to specify the language. Default is English.
      Returns:
      json String

    • evidenceCall

      public String evidenceCall(String uri, String id, String version, @Nullable String lang)
      Provides a specific version of an evidence.
      Specified by:
      evidenceCall in interface interfaces.ECertisClientInterface
      Parameters:
      uri - The URI of the request. E.g: https://ec.europa.eu/growth/tools-databases/ecertisrest/evidences/
      id - specify the id of an evidence
      version - to specify version. Defaults to first version.
      lang - to specify the language. Default is English.
      Returns:
      json String
